sql-case.value: UPDATE t_order SET status = ? WHERE order_id = ? AND user_id = ?
UPDATE t_order AS o SET o.status = ? WHERE o.order_id = ? AND o.user_id = ?
UPDATE t_order AS u SET status = ? WHERE u.order_id = ? AND u.user_id = ?

UPDATE t_order SET start_time = ?, status = 0, start_point = ST_GeographyFromText('SRID=4326;POINT('||?||' '||?||')'), rule = ?::jsonb, discount_type = ?, order_type = ? WHERE user_id = ? AND order_id = ?
UPDATE t_order o SET o.status = 'finished'
UPDATE t_order o SET o.status = 'finished'
UPDATE LOW_PRIORITY IGNORE t_order SET status = ? WHERE order_id = ? AND user_id = ?
UPDATE `t_order` SET `status` = ? WHERE `order_id` = ? AND user_id = ?
UPDATE t_order SET status = 'update' WHERE order_id = 1000 AND user_id = 10
UPDATE t_order SET status = 'update' WHERE (order_id = ? OR order_id = ?) AND user_id = ?
UPDATE t_order SET status = status - ? WHERE order_id = ? AND user_id = ?
UPDATE t_order SET status = ? WHERE order_id = order_id - ? AND user_id = ?
update t_order set order_id = order_id, status = 'init' where order_id = order_id AND order_id = ?

update stock_freeze_detail set row_status=case WHEN (id=?) THEN ? WHEN (id=?) THEN ? WHEN (id=?) THEN ? end, update_user=case WHEN (id=?) THEN ? WHEN (id=?) THEN ? WHEN (id=?) THEN ? end, update_time=case WHEN (id=?) THEN ? end where tenant_id = ?
UPDATE t_order SET status = ? WHERE order_id = ? AND user_id = ? ORDER BY order_id LIMIT ?
UPDATE t_order SET order_id = ? WHERE user_id = ?
WITH cte (order_id, user_id, status) AS (SELECT order_id, user_id, status FROM t_order) UPDATE t_order SET status = ? FROM t_order AS t JOIN cte AS c ON t.order_id = c.order_id WHERE c.order_id = ?
UPDATE t_order SET status = ? FROM t_order AS t JOIN t_order_item AS i ON t.order_id = i.order_id WHERE i.order_id = ?
UPDATE TOP(10) t_order SET order_id = ? WHERE user_id = ?
UPDATE TOP(10) PERCENT t_order SET order_id = ? WHERE user_id = ?
UPDATE t_order SET status = ? WHERE order_id = ?
UPDATE employees SET commission_pct = NULL WHERE job_id = 'SH_CLERK'
UPDATE employees a SET department_id = (SELECT department_id FROM departments WHERE location_id = '2100')
UPDATE employees SET job_id = 'SA_MAN', salary = 1000, department_id = 120 WHERE last_name = 'Douglas Grant'
UPDATE people_demo1 p SET VALUE(p) = (SELECT VALUE(q) FROM people_demo2 q WHERE p.department_id = q.department_id) WHERE p.department_id = 10

UPDATE employees a SET department_id = (SELECT department_id FROM departments WHERE location_id = '2100'), (salary, commission_pct) = (SELECT 1.1*AVG(salary), 1.5*AVG(commission_pct) FROM employees b WHERE a.department_id = b.department_id)
UPDATE t_order FORCE INDEX (PRIMARY) SET status = ? WHERE order_id = ?
UPDATE employees a SET salary = (SELECT salary FROM employees AS OF TIMESTAMP (SYSTIMESTAMP - INTERVAL '2' MINUTE) WHERE last_name = 'Chung') WHERE last_name = 'Chung'
UPDATE translate_tab SET char_col = TRANSLATE (nchar_col USING CHAR_CS);
UPDATE employees SET salary =.salary + 10 WHERE employee_id BETWEEN 1 and 10;
UPDATE ot1 SET VALUE(ot1.x) = t1(20) WHERE VALUE(ot1.x) = t1(10);
UPDATE T SET XmlCol = ( SELECT * FROM OPENROWSET(BULK 'C:\SampleFolder\SampleData3.txt', SINGLE_BLOB) AS x) WHERE IntCol = 1
UPDATE dbo.Cities SET Location.SetXY(23.5, 23.5) WHERE Name = 'Anchorage'
UPDATE Production.Product WITH (TABLOCK) SET ListPrice = ListPrice * 1.10 WHERE ProductNumber LIKE 'BK-%'
UPDATE Production.Product SET ListPrice = ListPrice * 1.10 WHERE ProductNumber LIKE @Product OPTION (OPTIMIZE FOR (@Product = 'BK-%'))
UPDATE YearlyTotalSales SET YearlySalesAmount=(SELECT SUM(SalesAmount) FROM FactInternetSales WHERE OrderDateKey >=20040000 AND OrderDateKey < 20050000) WHERE Year=2004
UPDATE dbo.Table2 SET dbo.Table2.ColB = dbo.Table2.ColB + dbo.Table1.ColB FROM dbo.Table2 INNER JOIN dbo.Table1 ON (dbo.Table2.ColA = dbo.Table1.ColA)
UPDATE OPENQUERY (MyLinkedServer, 'SELECT GroupName FROM HumanResources.Department WHERE DepartmentID = 4') SET GroupName = 'Sales and Marketing'
UPDATE OPENDATASOURCE('SQLNCLI', 'Data Source=<server name>;Integrated Security=SSPI').AdventureWorks2022.HumanResources.Department SET GroupName = 'Sales and Marketing' WHERE DepartmentID = 4

UPDATE Production.Document SET DocumentSummary .WRITE (N'features',28,10) OUTPUT deleted.DocumentSummary, inserted.DocumentSummary INTO @MyTableVar WHERE Title = N'Front Reflector Bracket Installation'
UPDATE Production.ProductPhoto SET ThumbNailPhoto = ( SELECT * FROM OPENROWSET(BULK 'c:Tires.jpg', SINGLE_BLOB) AS x ) WHERE ProductPhotoID = 1
UPDATE Archive.dbo.Records SET [Chart] = CAST('Xray 1' as VARBINARY(max)) WHERE [SerialNumber] = 2
UPDATE Production.Product SET Color = N'Metallic Red' WHERE Name LIKE N'Road-250%' AND Color = N'Red'
UPDATE HumanResources.EmployeePayHistory SET PayFrequency = 2 WHERE CURRENT OF complex_cursor
UPDATE Production.Product SET ListPrice += @NewPrice WHERE Color = N'Red'
UPDATE Production.ScrapReason SET Name += ' - tool malfunction' WHERE ScrapReasonID BETWEEN 10 and 12
UPDATE sr SET sr.Name += ' - tool malfunction' FROM Production.ScrapReason AS sr JOIN Production.WorkOrder AS wo ON sr.ScrapReasonID = wo.ScrapReasonID AND wo.ScrappedQty > 300
UPDATE HumanResources.Employee SET JobTitle = N'Executive' WHERE NationalIDNumber = 123456789
UPDATE dbo.Table2 SET dbo.Table2.ColB = dbo.Table2.ColB + dbo.Table1.ColB FROM dbo.Table2 INNER JOIN dbo.Table1 ON (dbo.Table2.ColA = dbo.Table1.ColA)
UPDATE dbo.Table1 SET c2 = c2 + d2 FROM dbo.Table2 WHERE CURRENT OF abc
UPDATE Cities SET Location.SetXY(23.5, 23.5) WHERE Name = 'Anchorage'
UPDATE t_order SET status = status - ? WHERE order_id = ? AND user_id = ? RETURNING status
UPDATE DimProduct SET ProductSubcategoryKey = 2 WHERE ProductKey = 313 OPTION (LABEL = N'label1');
UPDATE employees SET salary = 5000 WHERE department = 'HR';
UPDATE customers SET email = 'new@example.com', status = 'active' WHERE customer_id = 1001;
UPDATE products SET stock = 0;
UPDATE user_profiles SET last_login = NULL;
